CHAT.comment: There must have been a fault with the microphone as much of Neville's speech is faint and a lot of the rest is inaudible.
R shows N a book and N is naming the pictures

u.a: looking at the book together and naming
possibly R is talking to N all the time but is . . barely audible

CHAT.comment: M is knitting and N wants to kick her ball .. of wool around
Waiting for lunch. M in kitchen and her speech is inaudible throughout
A little bit of movement in bed
N is mixing sand with M
N helps F to mix cement
F scraping up mixed concrete with a shovel

g.ga: Mummy I want to go wee wee
